files.patch:
@@ -731,3 +731,3 @@
-        return this instanceof NoInitSegmentAllocator noInit ?
-                noInit.allocateNoInit(layout.byteSize(), layout.byteAlignment()) :
-                allocate(layout);
+        return this instanceof NoInitSegmentAllocator noInit
+                ? noInit.allocateNoInit(layout.byteSize(), layout.byteAlignment())
+                : allocate(layout);
@@ -738,3 +738,3 @@
-        return this instanceof NoInitSegmentAllocator noInit ?
-                noInit.allocateNoInit(layout.byteSize() * size, layout.byteAlignment()) :
-                allocate(layout, size);
+        return this instanceof NoInitSegmentAllocator noInit
+                ? noInit.allocateNoInit(layout.byteSize() * size, layout.byteAlignment())
+                : allocate(layout, size);
